>Subject: Trivial Levels and More
>
>I have written a Bow and Arrow Claculator for Fletching.
>
>http://www.dubuque.net/~sirkal/CalcFrames.htm
>
>But I am missing some of the highest level parts.
>
>If anyone knows any of the following, please e-mail me with the info.
>
>I need:
>
>Trivial level for Bone Arrow Vane
>Trivial Level and Stats for Bladed Arrowhead
>Trivial Level and Stats for Ceramic Arrow Vane
>Trivial Level and Stats for Steel Arrow Shaft
>Stats for Darkwood Bow Staff
>
>Thanks in advance.
Xezol - Lvl 13 Gnome Mag on E'Ci
